title: Touch ID
extract: Touch ID is a fingerprint recognition feature, designed and released by Apple Inc., that allows users to unlock Apple devices, make purchases in the various Apple digital media stores, and authenticate Apple Pay online or in apps.
extract_html: Touch ID is a fingerprint recognition feature, designed and released by Apple Inc., that allows users to unlock Apple devices, make purchases in the various Apple digital media stores, and authenticate Apple Pay online or in apps.
